Rule: Act out a scene from a movie. First person to guess the movie correctly picks someone to drink.
Answer a "would you rather" question or drink.
Do 13 pushups or take 2 drinks
Flip a coin. If it’s heads, you drink. If it’s tails, everyone else drinks.
Give a confession or drink. If the group doubt the sincerity of the confession, take three drinks.
Hum a song of your choice. First person to guess correctly picks someone to drink.
Imitate a celebrity or take 2 drinks.
Pick a person and start a staring contest. Loser drinks.
Pick a person to play rock, paper, scissors with. Loser drinks.
Pick a superhero and act out this superhero without talking. First person to guess correctly picks someone to drink.
Pick an animal and act out this animal without talking. First person to guess correctly picks someone to drink.
Pick someone and guess the colour of their underwear. If you're right, they drink. If you're wrong, you drink.
Pick someone to play a game of thumb war. Loser drinks.
Say the kinkiest thing you've done or drink.
Show everyone the last five photos on your phone or drink twice.
Tell a joke. Whoever laughs drinks. If no one chuckles or laughs, you drink twice.
The person after you can ask you any question. You can either answer truthfully or refuse to answer and drink.
The person after you can dare you to do anything. You can either fulfil the dare or refuse the dare and drink.
Without touching anything, everyone must balance on one leg. First person to lose balance drinks.
You must either take off an article of clothing or drink. (can’t be socks or shoes)
All persons must only speak with one or two-syllable words until someone messes up. That person drinks.
Ask another person a true or false question about yourself. If they answer correctly you drink, otherwise they drink.
Everyone guesses what time it is without looking. Whoever is furthest off, drink.
Everyone must speak in third person until someone messes up. That person drinks.
Imitate another person. First person to guess correctly picks someone to drink.
Make any action, the next person repeats all previous actions and adds another. Continue on until someone messes up. That person drinks.
On the count of three, start a group staring contest. Last person to blink picks someone to drink.
Pick a word. Everyone takes turns saying a word that relates to the previous word. The person that hesitates or says a non-relating word drinks.
Pick a word. Everyone takes turns saying a word that rhymes with it. The person that hesitates or repeats a word drinks.
Pick someone and guess the colour of their underwear. If you guess correctly, they drink, otherwise you drink.
Pick two people to perform a dance move of your choice. You pick the worst performer to drink.
Starting with you, take turns naming a colour. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats a colour. That person drinks.
Starting with you, take turns naming a country. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats a country. That person drinks.
Starting with you, take turns naming a fruit. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats a fruit. That person drinks.
Starting with you, take turns naming a land animal. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats. That person drinks.
Starting with you, take turns naming a spice. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats a word. That person drinks.
Starting with you, take turns naming an insect. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats. That person drinks.
Starting with you, take turns naming an ocean animal. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats a word. That person drinks.
Tell two truths and a lie. Anyone can answer and if the first answer is correct, you drink. Otherwise the person who guessed incorrectly drinks.
Waterfall! Start drinking and everyone else must drink as long as you do.
You are Simon. Everyone plays Simon Says. First person that messes up drinks.
Everyone democratically votes for a person to drink.
Everyone votes on who is most likely to spend money on something stupid. That person drinks.
Everyone votes on who is the biggest d**k. That person drinks two drinks.
Everyone votes on who is the most likely to argue with a stranger. That person drinks.
Everyone votes on who is the most likely to be in bed by 10 pm. That person drinks.
Everyone votes on who is the most likely to dodge paying for drinks. That person drinks.
Everyone votes on who is the most likely to get arrested. That person drinks.
Everyone votes on who is the most likely to get thrown out of a bar. That person drinks.
Everyone votes on who is the most likely to have a one-night stand. That person drinks.
Everyone votes on who is the most likely to spend all their money on something stupid. That person drinks.
Everyone votes on who is the nicest. That person picks someone to drink.
No drinks allowed until the next game-mandated drink.
No drinks this turn.
Switch places with someone across from you.
Make a new rule for the rest of the game. If most players object, take 2 drinks. Rule-break = drink.
Swap player turn order!
After this card is read, everyone must play in silence until it is your turn again. First person to laugh or talk drinks and ends the silence.
Keep your eyes closed until it’s your turn again. If you open your eyes, drink.
Make a rule for another person to follow until it is your turn again. Anyone who breaks the rule has to drink.
Make a rule that everyone has to follow until it is your turn again. Anyone who breaks the rule has to drink.
Talk with an accent until your next turn. If caught not speaking in the accent, you drink.
The person farthest from you makes a rule for you to follow until it is your turn again. Drink if you break the rule.
Whoever drank in the last round gets to pick two people to drink (they may pick the same person twice)
You cannot laugh until it’s your turn again. If you do, drink.
You cannot make eye contact with anyone until it’s your turn again. If you do, you drink.
Drink! Drink! Drink! Everybody drinks!
Drink! Drink! Drink! Everybody drinks!

If your age is an even number, drink.
On the count of three, everyone holds up either a thumbs up or a thumbs down. Whoever does the opposite of you drinks.
On the count of three, everyone says a colour from the rainbow. Whoever says the same colour as you has to drink.
persons who use spotify drink, persons who use apple music take two drinks.

The person who is the most depressed picks two other people to drink (you can pick the same person twice).

The person with the biggest hands picks someone to drink, and takes two drinks.
